faq.question: How many papers can I organize?
faq.answer: Free: 5 papers. Starter: 50 papers. Pro: 200 papers. Team: 1,000+ papers with unlimited organization features.

faq.question: Does it extract citation information?
faq.answer: Yes! AI extracts authors, title, journal, year, DOI when available. Export citations in any format (APA, MLA, BibTeX, etc.).

faq.question: Can I create custom tags?
faq.answer: Yes! AI creates automatic tags, and you can add your own custom tags for personal organization.

faq.question: Can I share collections with collaborators?
faq.answer: Yes! Team plan includes shared collections. Collaborate with coauthors or research group members.

faq.question: Does it work with reference managers like Zotero?
faq.answer: Yes! Export your organized library to Zotero, Mendeley, EndNote, or any reference manager via BibTeX.

faq.question: Can I import existing organization?
faq.answer: Yes. Upload PDFs with existing folder structure and we preserve the organization while adding AI enhancements.
